mapper.insert: insert into beauty_proxy (name, startnum, emdnum, dividends, product_offers, people_insured, mir, def) values (#{name}, #{startnum}, #{emdnum}, #{dividends}, #{product_offers}, #{people_insured}, #{mir}, #{def})
mapper.select: select id, name, startnum, emdnum, dividends, product_offers, people_insured, mir, created_time, updated_time, sore, status, def from beauty_proxy where status = 1
